GLchar* pszFragSource =
			"#ifdef GL_ES \n \
			precision mediump float; \n \
			#endif \n \
			varying vec4 v_fragmentColor; \n \
			varying vec2 v_texCoord; \n \
			uniform vec4 v_texAnimInfo; \n\
			uniform vec4 v_addcolor; \n\
			void main(void) \n \
			{ \n \
			vec2 uv = vec2(1.0 / v_texAnimInfo.z,1.0 / v_texAnimInfo.w);\n\
			uv.x = v_texAnimInfo.x * uv.x + v_texCoord.x * uv.x;\n\
			uv.y = v_texAnimInfo.y * uv.y + v_texCoord.y * uv.y;\n\
			vec4 c = texture2D(CC_Texture0, uv); \n \
			gl_FragColor = v_fragmentColor * c * v_addcolor; \n \
			}";
